long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you using AWS IAM Identity Center, AWS Account Display Customizer makes it easy to understand account names after logging into the AWS console. 
Simply enter your AWS account ID and environment name pairs to use it.

ref: https://github.com/ruchikawa/aws-account-display-customizer/tree/main
